Html:
Hi,

Thank you very much for the support. DDD is providing all the basic needs fro my application and also I observerd the performance is good.
I need some more clarifications.

Will this support BAR chart and Pie Chart

Regards
Ravi.

Hi Ravi,

Yes, DynamicDataDisplay will have bar and pie charts in future, though this does not correlate well with its main purpose - to visualize large amount of scientific data.

This feature will be available nearly in June or July.

Regards,
Mikhail.
